transArray.content: Dear guest: Thank you for your praise and trust in us. We are very happy to meet you. Your encouragement has given us a lot of confidence. The hotel is very close to the maternity and gynecology hospital. If you contact us, you can take a taxi there. Maternity and gynecology hospital Parking around the hospital is not very convenient. The hotel has free parking. We look forward to your next visit to Beijing.
